text: Oberdorf is a municipality of the canton of Nidwalden in Switzerland. The economy of Oberdorf is mainly based in agriculture. The main sight of Oberdorf is the Benedictine convent Maria-Rickenbach. The convent can only be reached by cable car. == References == == Other websites == *Official Website of Oberdorf Category:Municipalities of Nidwalden
title: Oberdorf, Nidwalden
